skillTree.name: Steed of Slaanesh
skillTree.description: Steeds have long, sinuous bodies that writhe ceaselessly as they dash towards the foe.

skillTree.name: Seeker Chariot
skillTree.description: Straining steeds urge the chariot to full speed, where swirling shapes sear the air with unholy hues.

skillTree.name: Exalted Seeker Chariot
skillTree.description: Exalted Chariots are a blur of chromatic scythes and slicing blades pulled by Slaanesh's steeds.

skillTree.name: Supple & Spry
skillTree.description: This one’s writhing form can slowly caress and tease, but also move like lightning when required, knocking a projectile from the air or batting it back at the foe.

skillTree.name: Hates Khorne
skillTree.description: This obsession with murder is just cheap, mindless bloodlust of the basest kind. To the servants of Slaanesh, there's so much more to life… and to death too, of course.

effects.description: Melee attack: +10 when fighting against Khornate factions
Weapon strength: +15% when fighting against Khornate factions

skillTree.name: Immortality
skillTree.description: Who wants to live forever? As it turns out, most beings wouldn't say no…

effects.description: When normally killed in battle, this Lord will be wounded instead

skillTree.name: Rapid Ruination
skillTree.description: Swift flashes of an agile form and razor-sharp blades are all this Daemon Lord's victims see of him, but by then it's already far, far too late.

skillTree.name: Devastating Charge
skillTree.description: Some creatures charge home with such fury that the very ground shakes beneath their feet.

skillTree.name: Thick-Skinned
skillTree.description: Creatures with tough hides or some kind of natural armour are tough nuts to crack - even a powerful attack may fall foul of their thick-skin.

skillTree.name: Hard to Hit
skillTree.description: Hand-to-hand combat is a lethal match of cut and thrust. However, it’s not all about offensive strikes; parries and other defensive moves can also win the day.

skillTree.name: Deadly Blade
skillTree.description: A deadly blade is especially lethal when in the hands of this master death-maker, killer and slaughterer!

skillTree.name: Foe-Seeker
skillTree.description: From one bloodied, lifeless corpse to the next, this one is always looking for the next adversary to best.

skillTree.name: Wound-Maker
skillTree.description: Such is their power and ferocity, a wound-maker will ravage the foe, cutting and pulverising until there is only one exit - death.

skillTree.name: Scarred Veteran
skillTree.description: The scars on this storied warrior reveal a veteran of many battles, a being not easy to kill and one worthy of respect and fear.

skillTree.name: Indomitable
skillTree.description: The iron will and indomitable presence of this leader ensures their followers remain steadfast when facing peril.

skillTree.name: Blade Shield
skillTree.description: A blade that sings in defence will not let its wielder be penetrated.

skillTree.name: Deadly Onslaught
skillTree.description: The war is endless. The cycle of charging, clashing, and bloody hand-to-hand fighting is without end. It will never stop.

effects.description: Winds of Magic cost: -1 for "Lash of Slaanesh"
Winds of Magic cost: -2 for "Lash of Slaanesh Upgraded"
Miscast base chance: -15% for "Lash of Slaanesh Upgraded"
Winds of Magic cost: -2 for "Acquiescence Upgraded"

ui_effects.description: Strong vs 25 men unit or above
Strong vs 25 men unit or above
Strong vs 25 men unit or above
Strong vs 25 men unit or above
Strong vs 25 men unit or above

effects.description: Winds of Magic cost: -2 for "Pavane of Slaanesh"
Winds of Magic cost: -3 for "Pavane of Slaanesh Upgraded"
Miscast base chance: -15% for "Pavane of Slaanesh Upgraded"
Winds of Magic cost: -2 for "Hysterical Frenzy"
Winds of Magic cost: -3 for "Hysterical Frenzy Upgraded"
Miscast base chance: -15% for "Hysterical Frenzy Upgraded"
Winds of Magic cost: -2 for "Slicing Shards"
Winds of Magic cost: -3 for "Slicing Shards Upgraded"
Miscast base chance: -15% for "Slicing Shards Upgraded"
Winds of Magic cost: -3 for "Phantasmagoria Upgraded"

skillTree.name: Earthing
skillTree.description: By stabbing a staff or some arcane conduit into the ground, an accomplished magic-user can earth or tether the Winds and hopefully reduce a chance of miscasting.

skillTree.name: Magical Reserves
skillTree.description: A few magic-users have the ability to store the Winds of Magic for later use, increasing their spellcasting power when it really counts.

effects.description: Winds of Magic power reserve change: +20% when increasing

skillTree.name: Inspiring Presence
skillTree.description: There are Lords that radiate power, confidence and fear, inspiring their followers to great or terrible acts.

skillTree.name: Daemonic Inspiration
skillTree.description: Even the Children of Slaanesh can be inspired to ever greater depths of depravity.

effects.description: Melee attack: +4 for Daemonettes of Slaanesh and Exalted Daemonettes of Slaanesh units
Melee attack: +4 for Daemonettes of Slaanesh and Exalted Daemonettes of Slaanesh units
Charge bonus: +6 for Daemonettes of Slaanesh and Exalted Daemonettes of Slaanesh units
Melee attack: +6 for Daemonettes of Slaanesh and Exalted Daemonettes of Slaanesh units
Charge bonus: +8 for Daemonettes of Slaanesh and Exalted Daemonettes of Slaanesh units

skillTree.name: Hellish Stride
skillTree.description: The warriors of Slaanesh waste no time in hunting down their victims, for the heady delight of the kill is as addictive as it is exhilarating.

effects.description: Speed: +6% for Marauders of Slaanesh and Hellstriders of Slaanesh units
Armour: +4 for Marauders of Slaanesh and Hellstriders of Slaanesh units
Speed: +6% for Marauders of Slaanesh and Hellstriders of Slaanesh units
Armour: +8 for Marauders of Slaanesh and Hellstriders of Slaanesh units
Speed: +8% for Marauders of Slaanesh and Hellstriders of Slaanesh units

skillTree.name: Gratifying Charge
skillTree.description: Atop their powerful beasts of Slaanesh, the Seekers dart across the field of battle, cutting through their foes with devastating precision.

effects.description: Charge bonus: +12% for Seekers of Slaanesh and Heartseekers of Slaanesh units
Weapon strength: +12% for Seekers of Slaanesh and Heartseekers of Slaanesh units
Charge bonus: +12% for Seekers of Slaanesh and Heartseekers of Slaanesh units
Weapon strength: +16% for Seekers of Slaanesh and Heartseekers of Slaanesh units
Charge bonus: +18% for Seekers of Slaanesh and Heartseekers of Slaanesh units

skillTree.name: Princely Chariots
skillTree.description: There's little to do against the advance of a bladed chariot but to be ground beneath its heavy, bloodstained wheels.

effects.description: Melee attack: +6 for Seeker Chariots, Exalted Seeker Chariot and Hellflayers units
Melee attack: +6 for Seeker Chariots, Exalted Seeker Chariot and Hellflayers units
Weapon strength: +10% for Seeker Chariots, Exalted Seeker Chariot and Hellflayers units
Melee attack: +8 for Seeker Chariots, Exalted Seeker Chariot and Hellflayers units
Weapon strength: +15% for Seeker Chariots, Exalted Seeker Chariot and Hellflayers units

skillTree.name: Frenzied Revelry
skillTree.description: The minions of the Dark Prince carry out frenzied slaughter in his name. Their victims' abject despair is but a delicious feast for their master.

effects.description: Charge bonus: +12% for Chaos Furies, Spawn of Slaanesh and Fiends of Slaanesh units
Speed: +8% for Chaos Furies, Spawn of Slaanesh and Fiends of Slaanesh units
Charge bonus: +12% for Chaos Furies, Spawn of Slaanesh and Fiends of Slaanesh units
Speed: +12% for Chaos Furies, Spawn of Slaanesh and Fiends of Slaanesh units
Charge bonus: +18% for Chaos Furies, Spawn of Slaanesh and Fiends of Slaanesh units

skillTree.name: Such Sights to Show You
skillTree.description: Pleasure and pain sit on either side of a fine-edged blade, and the greatest of Slaanesh's servants delve eagerly into both extremes.

effects.description: Melee attack: +4 for Keeper of Secrets and Soul Grinder of Slaanesh units
Melee attack: +4 for Keeper of Secrets and Soul Grinder of Slaanesh units
Weapon strength: +8% for Keeper of Secrets and Soul Grinder of Slaanesh units
Melee attack: +6 for Keeper of Secrets and Soul Grinder of Slaanesh units
Weapon strength: +12% for Keeper of Secrets and Soul Grinder of Slaanesh units

skillTree.name: Acolytes of Hedonism
skillTree.description: The endless pursuit of hedonistic delights further corrupts even the most depraved of creatures.

effects.description: Leadership: +5 for Marauders of Slaanesh and Daemonettes of Slaanesh and Exalted Daemonettes of Slaanesh units (Rank 7 and above)
Melee defence: +5 for Marauders of Slaanesh and Daemonettes of Slaanesh and Exalted Daemonettes of Slaanesh units (Rank 7 and above)
Physical resistance: 10% for Marauders of Slaanesh and Daemonettes of Slaanesh and Exalted Daemonettes of Slaanesh units (Rank 7 and above)

skillTree.name: Connoisseurs of Delight
skillTree.description: The true veterans of battle exude an aura of rapturous fulfilment, dulling the senses of their lessers.

effects.description: Leadership: +5 for Hellstriders of Slaanesh, Seekers of Slaanesh and Heartseekers of Slaanesh units (Rank 7 and above)
Melee attack: +7 for Hellstriders of Slaanesh, Seekers of Slaanesh and Heartseekers of Slaanesh units (Rank 7 and above)
Missile resistance: 15% for Hellstriders of Slaanesh, Seekers of Slaanesh and Heartseekers of Slaanesh units (Rank 7 and above)

skillTree.name: Killer's Kiss
skillTree.description: The kiss of a lover, or the kiss of a blade – the decadence's Devotees will have you begging for both!

effects.description: Speed: +10% for Seeker Chariots, Exalted Seeker Chariot and Hellflayers units (Rank 7 and above)
Charge bonus: +15% for Seeker Chariots, Exalted Seeker Chariot and Hellflayers units (Rank 7 and above)
Missile resistance: 15% for Seeker Chariots, Exalted Seeker Chariot and Hellflayers units (Rank 7 and above)

skillTree.name: Secret Keeper
skillTree.description: There is no end to the power a being holds once it can tug at your wildest fantasies and twist your darkest fears.

effects.description: Leadership: +5 for Chaos Furies, Spawn of Slaanesh, Fiends of Slaanesh, Soul Grinder and Keeper of Secrets units (Rank 7 and above)
Melee defence: +5 for Chaos Furies, Spawn of Slaanesh, Fiends of Slaanesh, Soul Grinder and Keeper of Secrets units (Rank 7 and above)
Bonus vs Infantry: +7 for Chaos Furies, Spawn of Slaanesh, Fiends of Slaanesh, Soul Grinder and Keeper of Secrets units (Rank 7 and above)

skillTree.name: Route Marcher
skillTree.description: Those who know the land and its secrets will travel faster and further than the foes who don't.

skillTree.name: Serve or Die
skillTree.description: "You will serve me, wretch, or you will die, there is no other option."

skillTree.name: Slaves to Excess
skillTree.description: The Perfect Prince can never have too many Devotees. It matters not one jot to Slaanesh whether they come to him willingly or are coerced into His worship.

skillTree.name: Despoilers
skillTree.description: To despoil, to corrupt and ruin, to break the mortals and take their gods from them - this is what Chaos wants.

skillTree.name: Corruption
skillTree.description: With the servants of Chaos comes the corruption – as the landscape twists, this one speeds the transformation.

skillTree.name: Draftmaster
skillTree.description: Someone has to ensure the numbers and quality of recruits remain high.

skillTree.name: Lightning Strike
skillTree.description: "The time to strike is now!"

effects.description: Enables lightning strike battles when reinforcements are present

skillTree.name: Drawn to Decadence
skillTree.description: Having given itself willingly to the service of Slaanesh, this force requires neither the carrot nor the stick to fight for Him though either one would no doubt be pleasurable!

skillTree.name: Relentless Advance
skillTree.description: Battles can be lost, but can the war ever really be won? The advance of Ruin can never truly be halted once and for all.

effects.description: Attrition: -10% casualties suffered from all attrition
Attrition: -20% casualties suffered from all attrition
Attrition: -30% casualties suffered from all attrition

skillTree.name: Unholy Worship
skillTree.description: The true experience of divinity can be found in the ecstasy of indulgence.

skillTree.name: Renowned & Feared
skillTree.description: This Lord's many deeds - both on and off the battlefield - have brought them renown among their allies and made them feared by their enemies.

effects.description: Hero self-defence: +25% chance of wounding aggressors

backgroundSkills.name: Aggressive
backgroundSkills.description: If you're gonna die, you may as well die with your boots on.

backgroundSkills.name: Confident
backgroundSkills.description: Self-belief is a fine thing when not misplaced.

backgroundSkills.name: Cunning
backgroundSkills.description: Deceit is a perfectly acceptable means of attack.

backgroundSkills.name: Disciplined
backgroundSkills.description: Always in control, this one leaves no stone unturned and nothing to chance.

backgroundSkills.name: Fleet-Footed
backgroundSkills.description: Being fleet of foot is useful in a fight… or when trying to get away afterwards!

backgroundSkills.name: Intelligent
backgroundSkills.description: Sharp minds make sharp blades sharper still.

effects.description: Hero self-defence: +5% chance of wounding aggressors

backgroundSkills.name: Knowledgeable
backgroundSkills.description: What this being doesn't know probably isn't worth knowing, so deep is their interest in the world and its ways.

effects.description: Winds of Magic power reserve change: +5% when increasing
Enemy Winds of Magic power reserve change: -10% when increasing

backgroundSkills.name: Strategist
backgroundSkills.description: This being has a plan - not just a game plan, but a master plan to achieve their long-term aims.

backgroundSkills.name: Tactician
backgroundSkills.description: Careful planning, knowledge of the terrain and the weaknesses of the enemy are the key to victory.

backgroundSkills.name: Tough
backgroundSkills.description: Rugged, resistant, and almost unbreakable, this being can and will take on all comers.

backgroundSkills.name: Weapon Master
backgroundSkills.description: If you can swing, slash, stab, gouge, or shoot it, this warrior has mastered every aspect of its use.

backgroundSkills.name: Perceptive
backgroundSkills.description: Although actually reading minds is not in their skillset, this one has extraordinary insight into the motives of others.

backgroundSkills.name: Enslaver
backgroundSkills.description: "I'm bored," said the perverse Lord of Excess. "What playthings can you offer me today?"

backgroundSkills.name: Siren
backgroundSkills.description: This one's eerily seductive beauty has proved to be most useful both in the bedroom and on the battlefield.

backgroundSkills.name: Perfectionist
backgroundSkills.description: Flawlessness is not an unattainable goal for those who serve the Perfect Prince; for the chosen few, it can be a reality.

backgroundSkills.name: Depraver
backgroundSkills.description: Even the purest, most virtuous soul can be distorted to vile perversion or inveterate depravity if the right sort of temptation is offered.
